extension.summary: private changes of some addons should not missed
extension.description: private changes of some addons should not missed

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Queries, stores, and returns metadata for TV shows, Movies and Musicvideos. [CR]Sources:[CR]www.thetvdb.com[CR]www.themoviedb.org[CR]www.imdb.com[CR]www.omdbapi.com[CR]This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.

addon.name: Aeon Nox: SiLVO

extension.summary: Erstellt von BigNoid, modifiziert von SiLVO, Widgets von Mr. V
extension.description: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
extension.news: For a more complete list visit:[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master[/COLOR][/I]

addon.news: [I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.0.8[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Fix and add some new icons[CR]- PVR fixes and updates[CR]- Keyboard updates to support new/missing elements for some languages[CR]- Add multi-poster support[CR]- Add option to limit displayed Widget content (may improve performance)[CR]- Add more movie set metadata e.g. Studio and Rating classification mediaflags[CR]- Fix backgrounds and add user selectable icons for custom Widget[CR]- Add Wall view for Files, Artists & Music genres[CR]- Add user selectable music genre icons using path or resource add-on[CR]- Add banners option to Wall view[CR]- Remove script.grab.fanart as dependency[CR]- Add TV Show - Next Aired Widget[CR]- Add last used sort by to Widget Customizer (only works for certain widgets)[CR]- Add OpenCase mod for some music views[CR]- Main Menu customizer improvements[CR]- Add option to prefer summary of movie set instead of all plots[CR]- DialogMusicInfo changes and improvements[CR]- Music Video fixes[CR]- Show square panel info content for settings Widgets[CR]- Rework Global Search window[CR]- Fix LowList view when track numbers are over 99[CR]- Add manual Music InfoPanel setting[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]PVR[/COLOR][/I][CR]- add new PVR Branch[CR]
